name: Asteroid Destroyer (Teco SC Developer, Gammed, Soninho dev)
name_original: Asteroid Destroyer (Teco SC Developer, Gammed, Soninho dev)
description:
Game made for ScoreSpace Game Jam - Limitation: Bounce by a team of 3

Gammed - Musician - https://gammed.itch.io/

SoninhoDev - Artist - https://soninho-dev.itch.io/

Teco SC Developer - Programmer - https://teco-sc-developer.itch.io/

It's about a spaceship that aims to travel across the huge universe, but beware of asteroids.

Will you be able to get the highest score?
